actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Treasury to issue $2 bills bearing a design emblematic of the Bicentennial of the American Revolution on the reverse.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to issue $2 bills bearing a design emblematic of the Bicentennial of the American Revolution on the reverse side.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Treasury to issue $2 bills bearing a design emblematic of the Bicentennial of the American Revolution on the reverse.
